title: Why We Shouldn’t Focus on a Conversion Experience So Heavily
description:
This is my speech for theology class where I critique the concept of conversion in neo-evangelical Christianity based on C.S. Lewis's Mere Christianity. 

My Writing: https://coltonkirby.substack.com/

There is an audio version of my videos (on all podcast platforms): https://anchor.fm/coltonkirby

About Me: https://coltonkirby.substack.com/about
Twitter: https://twitter.com/_coltonkirby
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/officialcolt...
Goodreads: https://www.goodreads.com/user/show/1...
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/officialcol...
Pinterest: https://www.pinterest.com/coltonjkirb...
Odysee: https://odysee.com/@ColtonKirby
